content:
Hello,
I am looking for source code of the reference implementation. More specifically, x-provenance implementation. I know x-provenance does not exist for hapi-fhir. Can someone point me to a link ?. thanks
what 'reference implementation"? HAPI-FHIR is the java one... if it doesn't support X-Provenance, consider making a contribution so that it does

In other words: there is no "single reference implementation that implements everything in the spec". There are a bunch of implementations, each of which implements a subset of features. Some of them, or none of them, may have implemented the feature you require.
thanks @Grahame Grieve @René Spronk . Sorry I am new to FHIR and not aware how it works. thanks.
No problem whatsoever - this platform is meant to be used exactly what you used it for: to ask questions ;-)
